name: Math Tapper Free: Multiply and Find
name_original: Math Tapper Free: Multiply and Find
description:
Sharpen your mind and practice your math with this simple, straightforward game! Two numbers appear at the top of the screen - multiply those numbers together to get the product, then find the product in the play field. At first there will be just one number in the grid, but each time you tap the correct square, more will be added making the difficulty greater and greater. Your goal: finish 100 levels in the fastest time possible.

Challenge your friends and family to top your best score, or play it alone to keep your mind strong and flexible and keep an eye out for future variations on the premise!
